validation.patternDescription: Invalid repository URL. The repository URL must start with https: or http:.

properties.name: RemoteJobs

validation.patternDescription: Enter the Jenkins address in IP format. Domain names are not supported. For example, https://xxxx:xxx/jenkins.

properties.name: generic-git-pipeline-sourcecode

parameters.name: publicKey
parameters.label: Certificate file
parameters.helpText: The certificate contains information such as the certificate's public key and signature，The certificate extension is “.crt” or “.pem”. The format of the content is : Start with “------ BEGIN CERTIFICATE ----” and end with “------ END CERTIFICATE ----”

parameters.name: privateKey
parameters.label: Private Key
parameters.helpText: The private key of the certificate, with a private key extension of “.crt” or “.pem”. You can directly enter the content of the private key file. The format of the content is : Start with “------ BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY ----” and end with “------ END RSA PRIVATE KEY ----”

properties.helpMarkdown: An endpoint used to store certificate information，You can use this endpoint the cluster network access configuration of the developer debugging service

properties.name: bitbucket-git-pipeline-sourcecode

parameters.name: username
parameters.label: Username
parameters.description: Username for connecting to the endpoint

properties.helpMarkdown:
An endpoint used to connect to a bitbucket repository, which can be used in CodeArts Pipeline, CodeArts Build, and other services.
The username can be found at [Bitbucket profile settings -> Username] on the bitbucket personal settings page. [link](https://bitbucket.org/account/settings/)
The password can be created on bitbucket, make sure you have at least [Account->Read & Project->Read] permission [link](https://bitbucket.org/account/settings/app-passwords/)

properties.name: AGCEndpoint
properties.helpMarkdown:
Connect to AGC Connect API, Using it in pipelines.
1. Sign in to [AppGallery Connect](https://developer.huawei.com/consumer/en/service/josp/agc/index.html) and click Users and permissions. Go to API key > Connect API and click Create as you need.
2. After the client is successfully created, record the values of Client ID and Key in the client information list.

data.description: Connect to AGC Connect API, Using it in pipelines.
data.name: AGCEndpoint

properties.name: codehub-https-pipeline-sourcecode

url.helpText: HTTPS clone address, for example https://*.huaweicloud.com.

parameters.name: username
parameters.label: Username
parameters.helpText: HTTPS username. The format is Tenant name/IAM username.
parameters.description: Username for connecting to the endpoint

properties.helpMarkdown:
Repo HTTPS password authorization can be used in Pipeline service to elevate the code library operation permission. Click your profile picture and choose 'This Account Settings > Repo > HTTPS Password' to view and set user password information.
[Learn more](https://support.huaweicloud.com/intl/en-us/usermanual-pipeline/pipeline_01_0011.html#section2)
